Text:
Let us pray.
Be with us, Lord, throughout this night. [t] Give us restful sleep and an early morning. [*] Help us wake up tomorrow ready and able to rejoice in the resurrection of Your Christ. You who lives and reigns forever.
Amen.
Changes: 2023-12-09 - Paul Prins: Updated after the midpoint to fix a grammar issue.
2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Retranslated this prayer to fit with other compline concluding prayers
